item.title: 日本央行发布关于缩减债券计划的市场观点摘要
item.description: 日本央行周二公布了一份意见摘要，内容是在对债券市场参与者的调查中收集到的关于央行应如何缩减巨额债券购买的意见。【原文：The Bank of Japan on Tuesday released a summary of opinions it collected in a survey of bond market participants on how the central bank should taper its huge bond purchases.】

item.title: 德国商报》报道：德国上半年破产率高于预期
item.description: 据《德国商报》报道，今年上半年，德国破产的大中型企业数量比去年同期增加了 41%，原因是通货膨胀、成本上升和需求减弱。【原文：The number of medium-sized and large companies in Germany that went insolvent in the first half of this year was up 41% compared with the same period last year, the Handelsblatt daily reported, citing inflation, rising costs and weakening demand.】

item.title: 保时捷上半年交付量下降 7
item.description: 德国跑车制造商保时捷周二表示，今年上半年全球汽车交付量与2023年同期相比下降了7%，原因是全球市场环境充满挑战，中国经济形势紧张。【原文：German sportscar maker Porsche said on Tuesday that global vehicle deliveries were down 7% in the first half of the year compared to the same period in 2023, citing a challenging global market environment and a tense economic situation in China.】

item.title: 中国 6 月新增人民币贷款因政策支持而激增
item.description: 路透社周二的一项民意调查显示，中国6月份新增人民币贷款可能比5月份翻了一番多，因为在经济复苏不稳的情况下，中国央行继续加大了对经济的政策支持力度。【原文：China's new yuan loans likely more than doubled in June from May, a Reuters poll showed on Tuesday, as the central bank kept up policy support for the economy amid a shaky recovery.】

item.title: 淡马锡投资组合价值小幅增长；对中国持谨慎态度
item.description: 新加坡国有投资者淡马锡周二表示，其投资组合净值已恢复增长，涨幅为1.8%，并补充说，在美国和印度的投资利润帮助缓解了中国市场表现不佳的影响。【原文：Singapore state investor Temasek said on Tuesday its net portfolio value had swung back to growth with a 1.8% gain, adding that profits from investments in the United States and India helped cushion the impact of underperformance in China.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，KKR 将减持日本切削工具制造商 Kokusai Electric 的股份
item.description: 私募股权公司 KKR 计划减持其在国际电气公司（Kokusai Electric）的股份，两位熟悉内情的人士称，在这家日本芯片设备制造商的股价大涨之后，KKR 计划套现。【原文：Private equity firm KKR plans to cut its stake in Kokusai Electric , two people familiar with the matter said, cashing in after a blistering run for shares in the Japanese chip equipment maker.】

item.title: 迪斯尼将在东京增加新船以扩大游轮业务
item.description: 华特迪士尼周二公布了推出新游轮的计划，新游轮将于 2028 财年从东京启航，为该品牌不断壮大的船队增添第九艘游轮。【原文：Walt Disney unveiled plans on Tuesday to launch a new cruise ship that will set sail from Tokyo starting in fiscal 2028, adding a ninth vessel to the brand's growing fleet.】

item.title: Meta 和沃达丰优化视频以提高网络效率
item.description: Instagram 的所有者 Meta 与沃达丰合作，在不明显影响观看体验的情况下优化了短视频的传输，从而释放了其 11 个欧洲移动网络的容量。【原文：Instagram-owner Meta has worked with Vodafone to free up capacity on 11 of its European mobile networks by optimising the delivery of short-form video without noticeably compromising the viewing experience.】

item.title: 新交所首席执行官表示，目前没有允许加密货币上市的计划
item.description: 新加坡交易所（SGX）首席执行官罗文财（Loh Boon Chye）周二表示，新加坡交易所（SGX）目前还没有允许加密货币在其交易所上市的计划，并补充说，采取这一举措的条件还不成熟。【原文：Singapore Exchange (SGX) has no immediate plans to allow cryptocurrency listings on its bourse, CEO Loh Boon Chye said on Tuesday, adding that conditions are still not ripe for such a move.】

item.title: Stellantis 将扩大混合动力汽车产品线以满足日益增长的需求
item.description: Stellantis 周二表示，到 2026 年，该公司将在欧洲把经济型混合动力汽车产品线扩展到 36 种车型，以满足对这种发动机类型日益增长的需求。【原文：Stellantis said on Tuesday it would expand its line of affordable hybrid vehicles to 36 models in Europe by 2026, to meet growing demand for this engine type, an alternative to petrol-fuelled cars and electric vehicles.】

item.title: 本田将终止泰国一家汽车厂的汽车生产
item.description: 日本汽车制造商本田汽车公司周二表示，该公司将在 2025 年之前停止其位于泰国大城府的工厂的汽车生产，因为该公司计划将其产量整合到其位于普拉钦武里府（Prachinburi）的工厂。【原文：Honda Motor will halt vehicle production at its factory in Ayutthaya province in Thailand by 2025 as it plans to consolidate its output under the plant it runs in Prachinburi province, the Japanese automaker said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国广州富力地产在香港面临清盘申请
item.description: 中国房地产开发商广州富力地产（R&F Properties）周二表示，由于未偿还贷款，其旗下的万亿荣华已收到一家新加坡私募基金的清盘申请。【原文：Chinese property developer Guangzhou R&F Properties said on Tuesday its unit Trillion Glory had received a winding-up petition from a Singapore-based private equity fund due to non-repayment of a loan.】

item.title: Cryptoverse：交易员屏息等待以太坊 ETF 热潮的到来
item.description: 以太可能即将迎来它的太阳时刻。【原文：Ether might be coming close to its moment in the sun.】

item.title: 三星电子赢得日本 Preferred Networks 公司尖端人工智能芯片订单
item.description: 三星电子周二表示，它赢得了日本人工智能公司 Preferred Networks 的订单，将利用韩国公司的 2 纳米代工工艺和先进的芯片封装服务为人工智能应用制造芯片。【原文：Samsung Electronics said on Tuesday it won an order from Japanese artificial intelligence company Preferred Networks to make chips for AI applications using the South Korean firm's 2-nanometre foundry process and advanced chip packaging service.】

item.title: 欧洲 法国陷入困境，聚光灯转向华盛顿
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 星展集团首席执行官称特朗普将对削减交易持开放态度，这可能适合中国
item.description: 新加坡星展银行集团首席执行官皮尤什-古普塔（Piyush Gupta）周二表示，美国总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）如果获胜，将对削减交易持开放态度，这可能适合中国。【原文：Singapore bank DBS Group's CEO Piyush Gupta said on Tuesday American presidential candidate Donald Trump, if he wins, would be open to cutting deals, which could suit China.】

item.title: 亚洲股市追随华尔街走高，市场期待鲍威尔的鸽派立场
item.description: 亚洲股市周二追随华尔街走高，因为市场希望美国联邦储备委员会主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）在当天晚些时候对宽松前景持鸽派态度，而美元则在四周低点附近企稳。【原文：Asian shares tracked Wall Street higher on Tuesday as markets hoped the U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell would sound dovish about easing prospects later in the day, while the dollar steadied near four-week lows.】

item.title: 中金公司高管认为中国客户在越南面临战略机遇
item.description: 中国国际金融有限公司（China International Capital Corp）东南亚地区负责人兼新加坡首席执行官黄志龙（Stephen Ng）表示，该行看到了中国企业客户在越南的更多战略机遇。【原文：China International Capital Corp's head of Southeast Asia and Singapore CEO Stephen Ng has said the bank is seeing more strategic opportunities for Chinese corporate clients in Vietnam.】

item.title: 澳大利亚承诺为太平洋银行业提供更多资金，以应对中国的兴趣
item.description: 在全球金融公司以风险为由限制对太平洋岛国的服务之后，澳大利亚周二承诺增加对太平洋岛国的投资，以支持这些国家的银行系统。【原文：Australia on Tuesday pledged to boost investments in Pacific Island countries to support their banking systems after global financial firms limit services with them, citing risks, at a time when China is looking to increase its influence in the region.】

item.title: 鲍威尔证词前美元下跌；欧元抵御法国的不确定性
item.description: 周二，美元兑主要货币汇率维持在数周低点附近，仍在因周五意外疲软的就业报告而耿耿于怀，交易员们在等待美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的证词，以寻找加息路径的线索。【原文：The U.S. dollar hung near a multi-week low versus major peers on Tuesday, still smarting from Friday's unexpectedly soft jobs report as traders awaited testimony from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell for clues on the path of interest rates.】

item.title: 调查显示：澳大利亚 6 月商业状况恶化，就业前景黯淡
item.description: 周二的一项调查显示，澳大利亚6月份的商业状况恶化，就业前景受到明显打击，不过由于成本压力有所缓解，企业的信心略有增强。【原文：Australian business conditions worsened in June with the outlook for employment taking a notable hit, a survey showed on Tuesday, though firms were a little more confident as cost pressures eased.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡将再用几周时间完成债务重组谈判
item.description: 斯里兰卡外交部长阿里-萨布里（Ali Sabry）周二表示，斯里兰卡将在几周内结束与国际债券持有人就其重组进程进行的会谈，这是该岛国摆脱数十年来最严重金融危机的重要一步。【原文：Sri Lanka will wrap up talks with international bondholders on its restructuring process in a few weeks, Foreign Minister Ali Sabry said on Tuesday, a major step for the island nation to emerge from its worst financial crisis in decades.】

item.title: 油价变化不大，对飓风破坏的担忧有所缓解
item.description: 飓风袭击了美国得克萨斯州的一个重要石油生产中心，造成的破坏比预期的要小，因此周二早盘油价变化不大。【原文：Oil prices were little changed early on Tuesday after a hurricane that hit a key U.S. oil producing hub in Texas caused less damage than expected.】

item.title: 澳大利亚消费者对税率持悲观态度，税收减免尚未显现
item.description: 周二的一项调查显示，由于对借贷成本可能上升的担忧盖过了降低税收和政府减免电费的前景，7月份澳大利亚消费者情绪有所下降。【原文：Australian consumer sentiment fell in July as fears about a possible rise in borrowing costs overshadowed the prospect of lower taxes and government relief on power bills, a survey showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 DigitalX 将在 ASX 推出现货比特币 ETF
item.description: 澳大利亚 DigitalX 公司周二表示，该公司已获准在澳大利亚证券交易所上市其现货比特币交易所交易基金。【原文：Australia's DigitalX said on Tuesday that it has obtained approval to list its spot bitcoin exchange-traded fund on the Australian Securities Exchange.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Bapcor 拒绝贝恩资本 12 亿美元的收购；任命新首席执行官
item.description: 汽车零部件零售商 Bapcor 周二拒绝了私募股权公司贝恩资本（Bain Capital）18.3 亿澳元（12.3 亿美元）的收购提议，称该提议 "不代表 Bapcor 的公平价值"。【原文：Auto parts retailer Bapcor rejected on Tuesday the A$1.83 billion ($1.23 billion) buyout offer from private equity firm Bain Capital, saying the proposal "does not represent fair value for Bapcor".】

item.title: 普渡大学债权人寻求批准起诉赛克勒家族成员
item.description: 普渡制药公司的债权人周一向美国一家破产法院寻求许可，以起诉该公司富有的所有者，他们认为在这家奥施康定生产商重新启动破产和解谈判时，诉讼既可以作为谈判工具，也可以作为后备选择。【原文：Purdue Pharma's creditors sought permission from a U.S. bankruptcy court on Monday to sue the company's wealthy owners, arguing that the litigation can serve as both a negotiating tool and a fallback option as the OxyContin maker re-starts talks on a bankruptcy settlement.】

item.title: 亚洲 放眼鲍威尔
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的威尔逊称美国大选前标准普尔 500 指数 "极有可能 "下跌 10
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）首席投资官迈克-威尔逊（Mike Wilson）周一在接受彭博电视采访时表示，在 11 月美国总统大选之前，基准 S&P 500 股票指数下跌 10%是 "极有可能的"。【原文：A decline of 10% in the benchmark S&P 500 stock index before the U.S. presidential election in November is "highly likely," Morgan Stanley Chief Investment Officer Mike Wilson said in an interview on Monday with Bloomberg TV.】

item.title: CBOE 申请美国证券交易委员会批准 Solana ETF 上市，所需决策开始计时
item.description: 交易所运营商 CBOE Global Markets 周一向美国证券交易委员会提出申请，希望上市与加密货币索拉纳（Solana）相关的交易所交易基金（ETF），要求该机构在 3 月前做出决定。【原文：Exchange operator CBOE Global Markets filed a request with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Monday seeking to list exchange-traded funds (ETFs) tied to cryptocurrency Solana, requiring the agency to make a decision by March.】
